```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Import data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

measles_raw <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2020/2020-02-25/measles.csv')
```

Cleaning steps:

1. Convert -1 in `overall` to NA (assuming this means a missing value)
2. Convert percentages from whole numbers to decimals
```{r}
measles <- measles_raw %>%
  mutate_at(vars(mmr, overall, xmed, xper), ~ ifelse(. == -1, NA, . / 100))
```
